      • assertDisplayNameDoesNotExistForTag

        public void assertDisplayNameDoesNotExistForTag(String tagCode,
                                                String displayName)
        Ensures that a tag entity does not exist for a specified tag type code and display name.
        Parameters:
        tagCode - the specified tag type code.
        displayName - the specified display name.

      • getTagChildrenEntities

        public List<TagEntity> getTagChildrenEntities(TagEntity parentTagEntity)
        Create a list of tag entities along with all its children tags down the hierarchy up to maximum allowed tag nesting level.
        Parameters:
        parentTagEntity - the parent tag entity
        Returns:
        the list of tag children entities

      • getTagEntity

        public TagEntity getTagEntity(TagKey tagKey)
                       throws ObjectNotFoundException
        Gets a tag entity and ensure it exists.
        Parameters:
        tagKey - the tag key (case insensitive)
        Returns:
        the tag entity
        Throws:
        ObjectNotFoundException - if the tag entity doesn't exist

      • validateParentTagEntity

        public void validateParentTagEntity(TagEntity tagEntity,
                                    TagEntity parentTagEntity)
        Validate the update tag request parent tag key. The parent tag should not be on the children tree of the updated tag. No more than MAX_HIERARCHY_LEVEL is allowed to update parent-child relation.
        Parameters:
        tagEntity - the tag entity being updated
        parentTagEntity - the tag update request

      • validateParentTagType

        public void validateParentTagType(String tagTypeCode,
                                  String parentTagTypeCode)
        Validates parent tag type's code against the tag type's code.
        Parameters:
        tagTypeCode - the tag type's code
        parentTagTypeCode - the parent tag type's code
